trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Pop-Location
trans-unit.target: Pop-Location

trans-unit.source: Pop-Location
trans-unit.target: Pop-Location

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Changes the current location to the location most recently pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的位置變更至最近推送到堆疊上的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can pop the location from the default stack or from a stack that you create by using the Push-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從預設的堆疊或從您使用 Push-Location Cmdlet 建立的堆疊中取出位置。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The Pop-Location cmdlet changes the current location to the location most recently pushed onto the stack by using the Push-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Pop-Location Cmdlet 會將目前位置變更至最近使用 Push-Location Cmdlet 推送到堆疊上的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can pop a location from the default stack or from a stack that you create by using a Push-Location command.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從預設的堆疊或從您使用 Push-Location 命令建立的堆疊中取出位置。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command changes your location to the location most recently added to the current stack.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將您的位置變更至最近新增到目前堆疊的位置。

trans-unit.source: This command changes your location to the location most recently added to the Stack2 location stack.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將您的位置變更至最近新增到 Stack2 位置堆疊的位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about location stacks, see the Notes.
trans-unit.target: 如需位置堆疊的詳細資訊，請參閱附註。

trans-unit.source: These commands use the Push-Location and Pop-Location cmdlets to move between locations supported by different Windows PowerShell providers.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令使用 Push-Location 和 Pop-Location Cmdlet 在不同的 Windows PowerShell 提供者所支援的位置之間移動。

trans-unit.source: The commands use the "pushd" alias for Push-Location and the "popd" alias for Pop-Location.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Push-Location 的 "pushd" 別名和 Pop-Location 的 "popd" 別名。

trans-unit.source: The first command pushes the current file system location onto the stack and moves to the HKLM drive supported by the Windows PowerShell Registry provider.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令將目前的檔案系統位置推送到堆疊上，並移至 Windows PowerShell 登錄提供者所支援的 HKLM 磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: The second command pushes the registry location onto the stack and moves to a location supported by the Windows PowerShell certificate provider.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令將登錄位置推送到堆疊上，並移至 Windows PowerShell 認證提供者所支援的位置。

trans-unit.source: The last two commands pop those locations off the stack.
trans-unit.target: 最後兩個命令將這些位置從堆疊中取出。

trans-unit.source: The first "popd" command returns to the Registry: drive, and the second command returns to the file system drive.
trans-unit.target: 第一個"popd"命令傳回登錄︰ 磁碟機，以及第二個命令會傳回檔案系統磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Passes an object representing the location to the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 將代表位置的物件傳遞至管線。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -StackName
trans-unit.target: -StackName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location stack from which the location is popped.
trans-unit.target: 指定要從中取出位置的位置堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Enter a location stack name.
trans-unit.target: 請輸入位置堆疊名稱。

trans-unit.source: Without this parameter, Pop-Location pops a location from the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這個參數，Pop-Location 會從目前的位置堆疊取出位置。

trans-unit.source: By default, the current location stack is the unnamed default location stack that Windows PowerShell creates.
trans-unit.target: 目前的位置堆疊預設是 Windows PowerShell 所建立的未命名預設位置堆疊。

trans-unit.source: To make a location stack the current location stack, use the **StackName** parameter of the Set-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓某個位置堆疊目前的位置堆疊，請使用 **StackName** Set-location cmdlet 的參數。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Pop-Location cannot pop a location from the unnamed default stack unless it is the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ Pop 位置無法取出位置未命名的預設堆疊中除非它是目前的位置堆疊。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 將命令加入使用中交易。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱包含使用中交易中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題中的

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to Pop-Location.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線傳送輸入至 Pop-Location。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None or System.Management.Automation.PathInfo
trans-unit.target: 無或 System.Management.Automation.PathInfo

trans-unit.source: When you use the PassThru parameter, Pop-Location generates a System.Management.Automation.PathInfo object that represents the location.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PassThru 參數時，Pop-Location 會產生代表位置的 System.Management.Automation.PathInfo 物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: A "stack" is a last-in, first-out list in which only the most recently added item is accessible.
trans-unit.target: 「堆疊」是一個後進先出的清單，其中只有最近新增的項目可供存取。

trans-unit.source: You add items to a stack in the order that you use them, and then retrieve them for use in the reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 將項目新增到堆疊中時，順序與您使用它們的順序相同，然後抓取它們來使用時的順序則相反。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell lets you store provider locations in location stacks.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 可讓您將提供者位置儲存在位置堆疊中。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell creates an unnamed default location stack and you can create multiple named location stacks.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 會建立未命名的預設位置堆疊，而且您可以建立多個具名的位置堆疊。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a stack name, Windows PowerShell uses the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定堆疊名稱，Windows PowerShell 會使用目前的位置堆疊。

trans-unit.source: By default, the unnamed default location is the current location stack, but you can use the Set-Location cmdlet to change the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，未命名的預設位置即是目前的位置堆疊，但是您可以使用 Set-Location Cmdlet 變更目前的位置堆疊。

trans-unit.source: To manage location stacks, use the Windows PowerShell Location cmdlets, as follows.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理堆疊位置，請使用各種 Windows PowerShell Location Cmdlet，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: To add a location to a location stack, use the Push-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要新增到位置堆疊的位置，使用 Push-location cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To get a location from a location stack, use the Pop-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得位置堆疊中的位置，請使用 Pop-location cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To display the locations in the current location stack, use the Stack parameter of the Get-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示目前的位置堆疊中的位置，請使用 Get-location cmdlet 的 Stack 參數。

trans-unit.source: To display the locations in a named location stack, use the StackName parameter of the Get-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示具名位置堆疊中的位置，請使用 Get-Location Cmdlet 的 StackName 參數。

trans-unit.source: To create a new location stack, use the StackName parameter of the Push-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立新的位置堆疊，請使用 Push-location cmdlet 的 StackName 參數。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a stack that does not exist, Push-Location creates the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的堆疊不存在，Push-Location 會建立該堆疊。

trans-unit.source: To make a location stack the current location stack, use the StackName parameter of the Set-Location cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓某個位置堆疊變成目前的位置堆疊，請使用 Set-Location Cmdlet 的 StackName 參數。

trans-unit.source: The unnamed default location stack is fully accessible only when it is the current location stack.
trans-unit.target: 未命名的預設位置堆疊只有在做為目前的位置堆疊時，才能供完整存取。

trans-unit.source: If you make a named location stack the current location stack, you cannot no longer use Push-Location or Pop-Location cmdlets add or get items from the default stack or use Get-Location command to display the locations in the unnamed stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將具名位置堆疊設定為目前的位置堆疊，您便無法再使用 Push-Location 或 Pop-Location Cmdlet 從預設堆疊新增或取得項目，或是使用 Get-Location 命令來顯示未命名堆疊中的位置。

trans-unit.source: To make the unnamed stack the current stack, use the StackName parameter of the Set-Location cmdlet with a value of $null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要將未命名的堆疊設定為目前的堆疊，請使用 Set-Location Cmdlet 的 StackName 參數搭配 $null 值或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to Pop-Location by its built-in alias, "popd".
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用內建的別名 "popd" 來參照 Pop-Location。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: The Pop-Location cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Pop-Location Cmdlet 是針對與任何提供者公開的資料搭配使用所設計。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PSProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出工作階段中可用的提供者，請輸入 "Get-PSProvider"。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: 取得位置

trans-unit.target: Push-Location
